document_data.caption: The Great Rift in Eastern Shaar
document_data.name: Great Rift
document_data.event1: [[Spellplague]] created [[Underchasm]], swallowing most of the Great Rift
document_data.end event: [[Second Sundering]] restored the [[Underchasm]] canyon to its former earthly land, like it was before the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.mainbody: e '''Great Rift''' was the traditional home of Faerûn's [[gold dwarves]], though there was also a human city nearby, called [[Khôltar]], until the [[Spellplague]] of [[1385 DR]]. The country of 1,300,000 dwarves, [[gnome]]s, [[halfling]]s, and humans was nominally ruled by a monarchy, but actually by a council of clan elders named the Deep Lords, from the capital of [[Underhome]].
document_data.Culture: "There is a difference between a Dwarf and a pick-axe" was a saying in the Great Rift. It meant that a good king didn't use his people like tools. <ref>
